Uses of Interface
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.mvevents.MVEvent

Packages that use MVEvent
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.common
Classes common to the server and the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.mvevents
Classes that implement the events from the model to a view of the Masters of Renaissance game.
it.polimi.ingsw.common.events.mvevents.errors
Classes that implement the error events from the model to a view of the Masters of Renaissance game.
